PerformancePlanOrReport.Name: Our Plan -- Section 3.0: Our Core Values
PerformancePlanOrReport.Description: The chapters in this section, and in Sections 4.0 and 5.0, present the goals, strategies, and tactics that will guide the future planning and policy decisions for the Town of Hilton Head Island into 2040.
PerformancePlanOrReport.OtherInformation: [Editor's note: This rendition presents the strategies and tactics as objectives in conformance with the Strategy Markup Language (StratML) standard (ISO 17469-1). It does not include the introductory and explanatory text, which can be found in the original PDF source.]

Mission.Description: To guide the future planning and policy decisions for the Town of Hilton Head Island into 2040.

Value.Name: Excellence
Value.Description: Our Ideals of Excellence are to be a community that:

Value.Name: Inclusiveness
Value.Description: 1. Is welcoming, inclusive, safe and people-focused;

Value.Name: Quality of Life
Value.Description: 2. Is recognized as an excellent place to live;

Value.Name: History
Value.Description: 3. Preserves, values and recognizes its history;

Value.Name: Attractiveness
Value.Description: 4. Attracts businesses and visitors who identify with and appreciate the Hilton Head Island communitys Core Values; and

Value.Name: Nature
Value.Description: 5. Protects the natural environment as a unique quality of our identity.

Value.Name: Greater Good
Value.Description: 6. Prioritizes the greater good of everyone;

Value.Name: Diversity
Value.Description: 7. Attracts and maintains a diverse and multi-dimensional residential population, providing a competitive live-work option; and

Value.Name: Culture
Value.Description: 8. Recognizes the benefit and value of arts, culture, recreation, and education for the community.

Value.Name: Collaboration
Value.Description: 9. Fosters a collaborative, transparent, and inclusive environment when resolving concerns or planning for the future;

Value.Name: Sustainability
Value.Description: 10. Considers sustainability as foundational to the Islands environment, economic, and social development and redevelopment;

Value.Name: Inspiration
Value.Description: 11. Fosters a spirit of inspiration and leads by example;

Value.Name: Innovation
Value.Description: 12. Uses innovation and learning to continually develop and apply best practices and standards for processes and projects; and

Value.Name: Adaptability
Value.Description: 13. Continually adapts the Core Values and comprehensive plan to meet the needs of the present and the future.

Goal.Name: IDEALS OF EXCELLENCE
Goal.Description: Adopt and Pursue Our Ideals of Excellence for Hilton Head Island.

Goal.Name: Place
Goal.Description: Pursue Strategies for Our Place

Objective.Name: Adoption
Objective.Description: Adopt Our Ideals of Excellence in order to initiate progress for these strategies and provide a foundation for the Town as outlined in this chapter.

Objective.Name: Deployment
Objective.Description: Deploy Our Ideals of Excellence through the Towns community engagement, communication standards and execution of projects and policy.

Objective.Name: Sense of Place
Objective.Description: Develop a sense of place that clearly communicates our community values and Our Ideals of Excellence, for example, through promotion or other visual standards.

Objective.Name: Promotion & Marketing
Objective.Description: Ensure Our Ideals of Excellence are reflected in how the Island is promoted and marketed.

Objective.Name: Recognition
Objective.Description: Apply for and promote awards of recognition for the Town of Hilton Head Island, such as the League of American Bicyclists Bicycle Friendly Community designation.

Objective.Name: History & Culture
Objective.Description: Foster the preservation and promotion of the rich cultural heritage and historical resources of Hilton Head Island.

Objective.Name: Standards
Objective.Description: Evaluate, develop and maintain standards that preserve and enhance the natural and physical environments that reflect the character of the Island.

Objective.Name: Projects & Properties
Objective.Description: Set an example for the community by developing and maintaining Town projects and properties in a manner that preserves and enhances Island character.

Goal.Name: People
Goal.Description: Pursue Strategies for Our People

Objective.Name: Communication Plan
Objective.Description: Develop a communication plan that relays Our Ideals of Excellence, the adoption of them, and these implementation strategies.

Objective.Name: History
Objective.Description: Encourage increased knowledge and awareness of the local Island and Gullah-Geechee history.

Objective.Name: Awards & Recognition
Objective.Description: Pursue awards and recognition that promote the qualities of our residential community.

Objective.Name: Accessibility
Objective.Description: Continue to host Town special events and meetings that are in compliance with adopted standards for accessibility, and evaluate adopting a policy for accessibility that meets or exceeds the standards.

Objective.Name: Demographic Data
Objective.Description: Continue to acquire and maintain the most current and accurate demographic data for Hilton Head Island for use by staff and the community.
Objective.OtherInformation: Collaborate with regional resources as needed to acquire data. See Economy Strategy 3.2

Objective.Name: Public Services
Objective.Description: Continue to provide excellent law enforcement, Fire Rescue, Emergency Management and disaster recovery services to the Island residents and visitors.

Objective.Name: Staff Facilities
Objective.Description: Continue to provide the staff and requisite facilities needed to maintain the excellent administration of all Town government functions, including customer service.

Objective.Name: Arts & Culture Education
Objective.Description: Continue to engage the community through excellent arts and culture education with outreach opportunities and events.

Objective.Name: Parks & Recreation
Objective.Description: Recognize the importance of parks and recreation for the Island community through the development, maintenance, improvement, and enhancement of recreation facilities and programs.
Objective.OtherInformation: See Inclusive Strategy 8.5, Our Plan Section 4.0 Parks + Recreation

Objective.Name: Diversity
Objective.Description: Work with partners and anchor institutions to promote opportunities that will diversify the residential population.

Objective.Name: Competitiveness
Objective.Description: Encourage development and opportunities that help Hilton Head Island be a competitive place to live and work.

Objective.Name: Volunteerism & Human Capital
Objective.Description: Leverage the deep experience and skills of the retirement community and their volunteerism to publicize the human capital on the Island.

Goal.Name: Planning & Process
Goal.Description: Pursue Strategies for Our Planning and Process

Objective.Name: Comprehensive Plan
Objective.Description: Evaluate the Towns comprehensive plan on a regular basis as required by the state for consistency and applicability to existing conditions, policies, and projects.

Objective.Name: Progress Reports
Objective.Description: Maintain a list of goals, strategies and tactics that are specifically being addressed or accomplished so the Island community can follow progress and stay involved with the comprehensive plan.

Objective.Name: Center for Excellence
Objective.Description: Create our Town government to be a Center for Excellence.

Objective.Name: Monitoring & Evaluation
Objective.Description: Encourage the Town government, boards, commissions, and staff to monitor and evaluate their work and projects for compliance with the Core Values and Our Ideals of Excellence.

Objective.Name: Surveys & Metrics
Objective.Description: Develop and deploy a survey or measurement tool to obtain the Island communitys outlook on Our Ideals of Excellence, interests, input, or concerns as applicable for Town projects, processes, or policies.

Objective.Name: Land Use
Objective.Description: Continue to provide an appropriate range of land uses that accommodate the needs of the community.

Objective.Name: Zoning & Regulations
Objective.Description: Provide appropriate modifications to the zoning designations and land use regulations to meet market demands while maintaining Island character.

Objective.Name: Design & Development Standards
Objective.Description: Ensure new design and development standards consider Our Ideals of Excellence.

Objective.Name: Engagement
Objective.Description: Continue to engage the community, above and beyond what is minimally required, for the planning and policy process.

Objective.Name: Civic Pride
Objective.Description: Instill a strong sense of civic pride by encouraging involvement in Town boards and commissions, in public decision-making, and through community engagement.

Objective.Name: Online Tools
Objective.Description: Evaluate and incorporate the application of online tools, applications or services in planning and engagement processes.

Objective.Name: Awards & Recognition
Objective.Description: Pursue awards and recognition for the Towns planning and design efforts.

Objective.Name: Partnerships
Objective.Description: Evaluate and utilize public and/or private partnerships and cooperation in Town projects or beautification efforts.

Objective.Name: Innovation & Learning
Objective.Description: In the development of best practices and standards for processes, policies and projects, use innovation and learning, to continually build and improve upon past experiences.

Objective.Name: Standards & Best Practices
Objective.Description: Identify and apply standards and best practices for processes and projects.

Objective.Name: Planning Process
Objective.Description: Ensure the planning process is dynamic and transparent.

Objective.Name: Continuous Improvement
Objective.Description: Use lessons learned and innovation to continually improve upon Our Ideals of Excellence and applicable strategies and tactics.

Goal.Name: WASTE
Goal.Description: Work towards a Town-wide zero waste model.

Objective.Name: Collection
Objective.Description: Examine waste collection options that take into account the unique aspects of the Island.

Objective.Name: Recycling & Composting
Objective.Description: Explore methods to improve recycling and composting rates.

Objective.Name: Processing Center
Objective.Description: Encourage Beaufort County to create an off-Island materials processing center and work with them to identify long term waste disposal and recycling capabilities.

Objective.Name: Education & Promotion
Objective.Description: Pursue promotional and educational efforts to foster recycling, composting, and litter control.

Objective.Name: Composting
Objective.Description: Facilitate composting models at highly visible sites, such as schools and Town facilities.

Objective.Name: Information
Objective.Description: Pursue new ways to disseminate information on waste and recycling on the Towns website to residents and visitors.

Objective.Name: Recycling & Litter
Objective.Description: Promote Beaufort Countys recycling and litter control programs.

Objective.Name: Reuse & Upcycling
Objective.Description: Incorporate initiatives to reuse and upcycle trash for art programs or local artists.

Goal.Name: SUSTAINABILITY
Goal.Description: Become recognized leaders in environmental protection and sustainability.

Objective.Name: Research
Objective.Description: Investigate ways to foster environmental ecosystem and environmental sustainability research.

Objective.Name: Event
Objective.Description: Sponsor an environmentally-focused event of regional or national significance.

Objective.Name: Town Hall
Objective.Description: Develop and implement a Sustainable Practices Plan for Town Hall.

Objective.Name: Structures & Sites
Objective.Description: Encourage and offer options for sustainable development of structures and sites.

Objective.Name: Development Projects
Objective.Description: Investigate implementation of environmentally sustainable standards, such as Sustainable Sites Initiative, LEED or Earthcraft, for all development projects.

Objective.Name: LID
Objective.Description: Integrate a Low Impact Development (LID) menu of optional design techniques in the LMO.
Objective.OtherInformation: Provide an incentive for each LID technique.

Objective.Name: Green Standard
Objective.Description: Create a green standard for all Town facilities and Capital Improvement Projects.

Objective.Name: Green Certifications
Objective.Description: Continue to pursue green certifications, such as Sustainable Sites Initiative, or LEED, for new and redeveloped Town facilities and infrastructure.

Objective.Name: Environmental Education
Objective.Description: Explore ways to expand environmental education efforts and programs, such as using new formats (videos) and promoting social media posts.

Objective.Name: Efforts & Projects
Objective.Description: Continue to implement effective environmental education efforts and projects, such as installing interpretive signs on Town property.

Objective.Name: Partnerships
Objective.Description: Strengthen existing and form new local, regional, and national partnerships with environmental organizations, governments, businesses, religious groups, civic groups, neighborhoods, POAs, schools and universities, etc, for environmental education purposes.

Objective.Name: Impervious Surfaces
Objective.Description: When evaluating property for land acquisition, identify opportunities to provide localized benefits such as reduction of stormwater runoff, increased shading of impervious surfaces, and overall reduction of impervious surfaces.

Objective.Name: Protections
Objective.Description: Continue to maintain or strengthen existing environmental protections for buffers, trees, wetlands, dunes and special habitat areas.

Goal.Name: WATER
Goal.Description: Monitor our water resource so that it is clean, abundant and available.

Objective.Name: Watersheds
Objective.Description: Preserve healthy watersheds and restore impaired watersheds.

Objective.Name: Water Quality
Objective.Description: Continue to publish water quality data in an annual report.

Objective.Name: Stormwater
Objective.Description: Continue to monitor water quality at stormwater discharge points and use the data to guide future infrastructure improvements.

Objective.Name: Incentives
Objective.Description: Explore incentives for applicants to use watershed friendly, low-impact planning strategies during plan review.

Objective.Name: Impervious Surfaces
Objective.Description: Look for ways to reduce impervious surfaces Island-wide through the use of pervious materials and other methods, and using the Town impervious surfaces map to address the watersheds with high impervious percentages.

Objective.Name: Headwaters
Objective.Description: Explore innovative methods to take development pressure off environmentally sensitive headwater regions.

Objective.Name: Broad Creek
Objective.Description: Continue to implement the recommendations of the Broad Creek Management Plan and evaluate the need to update the plan to address changing conditions.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Management
Objective.Description: Consider incentivizing alternative stormwater management techniques, to include LID techniques such as bioretention, treatment trains, permeable pavement, and infiltration.

Objective.Name: Irrigation
Objective.Description: Foster the reduction of the amount of treated water used for irrigation and increase the amount of reclaimed water used for irrigation.

Objective.Name: Plantings
Objective.Description: Continue to encourage the use of drought-tolerant native plantings with high wildlife value (food and habitat).

Objective.Name: Grass
Objective.Description: Educate the community about the benefits of limiting turf grass, which requires more irrigation and fertilization than native, drought-tolerant species.

Objective.Name: Town Projects & Properties
Objective.Description: Limit the amount of turf grass and species requiring irrigation planted for Town projects and properties.

Objective.Name: Reclamation & Storage
Objective.Description: Encourage infrastructure improvements needed to store and use reclaimed water.

Objective.Name: Rainwater
Objective.Description: Utilize projects and development on Town-owned land to demonstrate rainwater recycling techniques.

Objective.Name: Conservation & Pollution
Objective.Description: Continue efforts to educate the public on preventing water pollution and increasing water conservation.

Objective.Name: Xeriscape
Objective.Description: Promote sites like the Xeriscape Garden at Town Hall, and build demonstration sites and structures, such as green roofs and rainwater harvest technologies.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Resources
Objective.Description: Highlight resources for alternative stormwater management and designs for both single family and non-single family developments on the Towns website.

Objective.Name: Discharge & Runoff
Objective.Description: Ensure the beach environment stays protected by continuing to prevent surface runoff and/or discharge from stormwater and pools.

Goal.Name: ENVIRONMENT
Goal.Description: Protect and restore the natural environment of Hilton Head Island.

Objective.Name: Goals & Metrics
Objective.Description: Establish goals and clear metrics for: water (salt and fresh) quality and quantity; tree coverage; wildlife, and beach erosion.

Objective.Name: CPA-O & TA-O Districts
Objective.Description: Monitor the effectiveness of the Coastal Protection Area Overlay (CPA-O) and Transition Area Overlay (TA-O) districts.

Objective.Name: Beaches
Objective.Description: Continue to maintain and protect the beach ecosystem for wildlife (e.g. sea turtle nesting, island glass lizard habitat, piping plover critical habitat).

Objective.Name: Open Space
Objective.Description: Continue to preserve and maintain open space, including the improvement and enhancement of existing open space.

Objective.Name: Town Property
Objective.Description: Find ways to use Town property to showcase environmental preservation.

Objective.Name: Greenways
Objective.Description: Where applicable, establish greenways between Town properties and other areas of open space.

Objective.Name: Blueways
Objective.Description: Where applicable, establish blueways to link Town-owned properties.

Objective.Name: Utility Easements
Objective.Description: Encourage utility companies to maintain easements in a controlled state.

Objective.Name: Forests
Objective.Description: Create a forest preservation program to preserve and enhance the Islands forested areas.

Objective.Name: Wetlands
Objective.Description: Maintain and adapt the wetland management program to preserve and enhance our wetland system.

Objective.Name: Buffers
Objective.Description: Enhance, create, and maintain vegetated riparian wetland buffers with viewing corridors and windows.

Objective.Name: Town Properties
Objective.Description: Maintain and protect wetland buffers on Town property by utilizing native plants and pervious surfaces.

Objective.Name: Regulations
Objective.Description: Continue to evaluate and adopt regulations to ensure wetland buffers are protected.

Objective.Name: Ordinances
Objective.Description: Educate residents and visitors on natural resource ordinances.

Goal.Name: ENERGY
Goal.Description: Maximize the efficiency of energy usage and expand the use of renewable energy.

Objective.Name: Incentives
Objective.Description: Incentivize the use of energy-efficient building techniques, such as Sustainable Sites Initiative, LEED, Earthcraft, green materials and appliances for residential and nonresidential developments.

Objective.Name: Town Facilities
Objective.Description: Use Town facilities as examples of efficient energy use and renewable energy systems.

Objective.Name: Certifications
Objective.Description: Continue to pursue Sustainable Sites Initiative, LEED or similar certifications for Town buildings, project sites and facilities.

Objective.Name: Appliances & Systems
Objective.Description: Continue to install new and replacement (as needed) energy-efficient appliances, lighting, HVAC systems, etc. in Town buildings and facilities.

Objective.Name: Renewables
Objective.Description: Consider installing renewable energy systems, such as solar panels, on Town buildings/property to demonstrate the benefits of renewable energy sources.

Objective.Name: Town Buildings
Objective.Description: Reduce energy consumption of Town buildings where possible.

Objective.Name: Systems
Objective.Description: Encourage the use of renewable energy systems, such as solar panels.

Objective.Name: Palmetto Electric
Objective.Description: Promote Palmetto Electrics energy efficiency and renewable energy programs in Town facilities and to residents and visitors.

Goal.Name: RESILIENCE
Goal.Description: Prepare a plan for and to mitigate the effects of climate change.

Objective.Name: Plan
Objective.Description: Develop and implement a resiliency or adaptation plan to address coastal flooding, sea level rise and other issues the Island could face due to climate change.

Objective.Name: Technology
Objective.Description: Use the latest technology to better understand the long-term implications of sea level rise and climate change on the Islands natural resources.

Objective.Name: Carbon Footprint
Objective.Description: Consider committing to a new zero carbon footprint for Town facilities.

Objective.Name: Sea Level
Objective.Description: Continue to document sea level rise impacts on the Island.

Objective.Name: Codes
Objective.Description: Adjust Town codes as appropriate to minimize the impacts of climate change and sea level rise on private property.

Objective.Name: Elevation
Objective.Description: Examine the benefits and costs of requiring new structures to be elevated above the minimum requirements.

Objective.Name: Exemptions & Redevelopment
Objective.Description: Consider eliminating or reducing exemptions when permitting the redevelopment of nonconforming structures.

Objective.Name: Flood Maps
Objective.Description: Anticipate the effects of new FEMA Flood Maps.

Objective.Name: Beach Renourishment
Objective.Description: Maintain all programs required to support and continue the beach renourishment program.

Objective.Name: Wetlands
Objective.Description: Continue to acquire wetlands and other low-lying and flood-prone pieces of land in order to decrease development in flood-prone areas.

Objective.Name: Education
Objective.Description: Educate residents and visitors about climate change and how it will affect the Island.

Goal.Name: AIR QUALITY
Goal.Description: Improve air quality by reducing/minimizing emissions.

Objective.Name: Public Transit
Objective.Description: Explore opportunities for the further development and use of public transit (prioritizing vehicles that use renewable energy) and other innovative transportation strategies.

Objective.Name: Electric Transportation
Objective.Description: Promote the use of low impact alternative electric transportation where appropriate.

Objective.Name: Trees
Objective.Description: Preserve and plant trees for reduction of the urban heat island effect.

Objective.Name: Density & Trips
Objective.Description: Continue to purchase property to decrease the total available density and the number of peak hour trips on Island roads.

Objective.Name: Education
Objective.Description: Educate residents and visitors about air quality and its impact on human and environmental health.

Goal.Name: TRANSPORTATION
Goal.Description: Continue to improve access to and around Hilton Head Island.

Objective.Name: Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Encourage transit and technology providers to design and build consistent infrastructure coverage to/from and throughout the island to stay cost competitive and provide a prosperous economy.

Objective.Name: Options
Objective.Description: Consider diverse transportation options for alternate means of access to the Island.

Objective.Name: Airport
Objective.Description: Continue to work with Beaufort County to modernize and revitalize the Hilton Head Airport.

Objective.Name: Public Transportation
Objective.Description: Work with transportation partners to increase options for public transportation throughout the region to attract workforce and visitors, and provide options for residents.

Objective.Name: Transit Stops
Objective.Description: Complement public transit operations such as those of Palmetto Breeze (LRTA) by connecting transit stops with employment destinations and tourist destinations.

Objective.Name: Pathways
Objective.Description: Continue to promote and improve the Island multi-use pathway system as a viable alternative to auto-oriented transportations.

Objective.Name: Marine Transportation
Objective.Description: Evaluate options to integrate marine-based transportation when cost effective and where feasible.

Goal.Name: BUSINESS
Goal.Description: Attract more diverse businesses, specifically those with high intellectual capacity and a small footprint.

Objective.Name: Telecommuting
Objective.Description: Consider incentives for businesses that promote telecommuting or working from home.

Objective.Name: Marketing
Objective.Description: Collaborate and coordinate with existing organizations to market and expand upon Hilton Head Islands diverse economic opportunities.

Objective.Name: Start-Ups
Objective.Description: Foster and encourage new business start-ups.

Goal.Name: BRAND
Goal.Description: Manage evolving economic growth while maintaining Hilton Head Islands unique aesthetic.

Objective.Name: Redevelopment
Objective.Description: Support sustainable redevelopment that preserves the environment, modernizes infrastructure, and creates economic benefit to the greatest extent possible.

Objective.Name: Demographics & Trends
Objective.Description: Monitor demographics and economic trends to manage emerging growth and changes.

Objective.Name: Population Monitoring
Objective.Description: Maintain information to track the Islands actual daytime and seasonal populations, including the impacts of the commuting workforce and the seasonal visitor population on the Islands infrastructure and infrastructure planning and maintenance.

Objective.Name: Housing
Objective.Description: Monitor trends in housing development to provide housing options that meet market demands.

Objective.Name: Data
Objective.Description: Provide data as needed or requested to support other agencies or organizations.

Objective.Name: Aging Structures
Objective.Description: Monitor areas that have high concentrations of aging structures to target for potential redevelopment.

Objective.Name: Rehabilitation & Conversion
Objective.Description: Research opportunities to encourage property owners of dilapidated structures to rehabilitate and convert the buildings to workforce housing as a means to provide both redevelopment and additional housing.

Objective.Name: Commercial Buildings
Objective.Description: Continue to encourage repurposing or revitalization of existing commercial spaces/structures or buildings through flexibility or incentives for redevelopment.

Objective.Name: Innovation
Objective.Description: Explore innovative methods to guide development.

Objective.Name: Variety
Objective.Description: Encourage a variety of housing types to meet the needs of the population.

Objective.Name: Appearance Standards
Objective.Description: Consider adopting appearance standards to optimize the character of the Island.

Goal.Name: TOURISM
Goal.Description: Explore, understand, prepare for, and adapt to the future of tourism.

Objective.Name: Preparation & Adaption
Objective.Description: Work with the Hilton Head Island-Bluffton Visitor and Convention Bureau to prepare for and adapt to the future of tourism.

Stakeholder.Name: Hilton Head Island-Bluffton Visitor and Convention Bureau

Objective.Name: Promotion
Objective.Description: Promote the Island as a best-in-class, well-maintained, coastal Island residential and resort community with high speed telecommunication capability, road, sea and air access, where it is possible to operate with remote capability (telecommuting) and also enjoy a rich Island lifestyle.

Objective.Name: Culture & Heritage
Objective.Description: Encourage opportunities for culture and heritage based tourism.

Objective.Name: Balance
Objective.Description: Strive for a balance between tourism and resident economies.

Objective.Name: Branding
Objective.Description: Collaborate with organizations to market globally a clear brand of Hilton Head Island and what makes the Island unique.

Objective.Name: Ambassador Program
Objective.Description: Continue to encourage the Hilton Head Island Ambassador Program offered by the University of South Carolina Beaufort.

Objective.Name: Carbon Footprint
Objective.Description: Encourage the tourism industry on the Island to offer visitors a chance to mitigate their travel carbon footprint.

Objective.Name: Events
Objective.Description: Continue to support special events such as the Heritage Golf Tournament, Concours dElegance, etc.

Objective.Name: Funding
Objective.Description: Continue to support existing arts, culture, and history organizations through appropriate and creative funding.

Goal.Name: POPULATION
Goal.Description: Attract a diverse/dynamic local population.

Objective.Name: Young Professionals
Objective.Description: Build relevance to young professionals that represent the new economy by embracing technology and offering live/work options.

Objective.Name: Technology
Objective.Description: Continue to foster the use of technology that will allow opportunities to work remotely or from home.

Objective.Name: Aging
Objective.Description: Foster an economy that includes support for a healthy aging population and allows for aging in place.

Objective.Name: Older Population
Objective.Description: Work with appropriate organizations that can help the Town to best utilize and support its older population.

Objective.Name: Housing
Objective.Description: Encourage housing options that provide opportunities for residents to age in place.

Objective.Name: Health Care
Objective.Description: Create an environment for prosperity and innovation to allow the private sector health care providers to access adequate, cost effective health care services for the Islands aging population as well as residents and visitors.

Objective.Name: Retirees & Volunteers
Objective.Description: Leverage the deep experience and skills of retirees and their volunteerism to publicize the human capital on the Island.

Goal.Name: WORKFORCE
Goal.Description: Have a high quality, sustainable workforce.

Objective.Name: Workforce Housing
Objective.Description: Encourage the development of workforce housing through effective incentives.
Objective.OtherInformation: See Connected Tactic 4.1.1, Inclusive Strategy 3.3, Infrastructure Strategy 6.1, Regional Goal 2

Objective.Name: Strategic Plan
Objective.Description: Continue to pursue the recommendations from the Workforce Housing Strategic Plan.

Objective.Name: Moderate Income Housing
Objective.Description: Identify methods to support construction of new moderate income housing by 2024.

Objective.Name: Home Ownership
Objective.Description: Support programs aimed at increasing home ownership, for example, Habitat for Humanity.

Objective.Name: Town-Owned Properties
Objective.Description: Consider the use of Town-owned properties, where appropriate, for future development projects or land swaps for workforce housing.

Objective.Name: Land Acquisition
Objective.Description: Review the land acquisition program to determine if a workforce housing component would be an appropriate modification going forward.

Objective.Name: Demographics & Trends
Objective.Description: Monitor changing demographics and trends in housing development to allow for housing options to meet market demands.

Objective.Name: Education
Objective.Description: Continue to educate the public on the potential impact on their daily quality of life that is directly affected by the supply or lack of workforce housing.

Objective.Name: Education & Training
Objective.Description: Coordinate with educational institutions/agencies to meet the educational and training needs of the Islands population and workforce.

Objective.Name: Industry
Objective.Description: Collaborate with local industry to determine education needs for now and in future.

Objective.Name: Opportunities
Objective.Description: Encourage diverse educational opportunities that will prepare students for a career, including two-year trade schools.

Objective.Name: Wages & Benefits
Objective.Description: Evaluate results of Town staff wage and benefit analyses.

Objective.Name: Transportation
Objective.Description: Evaluate transportation options for the workforce.

Objective.Name: Public Transportation
Objective.Description: Support enhancements to the public transportation network, such as continued integration of bike racks on buses and linking pathways to transit stops, to providing a link to off-island users.

Objective.Name: Public Transit
Objective.Description: Support the coordination of existing regional public transit providers to enhance the service to the mainland and the Island for the commuting workforce.

Goal.Name: EDUCATION
Goal.Description: Create an environment that fosters equitable, high quality education options, where Hilton Head Island is recognized as an epicenter of life-long learning.

Objective.Name: Daycare
Objective.Description: Cooperate with the public school district, private schools, Island non-profit organizations, and concerned citizens to assess the Islands daycare facilities.

Objective.Name: Library
Objective.Description: Encourage Beaufort County to continue their efforts to provide resources and funding for the Hilton Head library.

Objective.Name: Education Programs
Objective.Description: Continue to coordinate with the University of South Carolina Beaufort (USCB) and other continuing education programs to partner with primary, secondary, and tertiary schools in establishing continuing education.

Objective.Name: Needs
Objective.Description: Cooperate with the public school district to assess the needs of the Beaufort County School District Hilton Head Island Cluster.

Goal.Name: VENUES & HISTORIC SITES
Goal.Description: Reimagine our venues and historic places so that they are inviting and accessible.

Objective.Name: Historic Landmarks
Objective.Description: Consider developing a historic landmarks protection or similar program per recommendations about historic and culturally significant sites from the Gullah Geechee Preservation Project Report.

Objective.Name: Access
Objective.Description: Continue to encourage planned communities and other private landowners to provide access to cultural and historic sites for family members, friends, and historians for the purpose of education and maintenance.

Objective.Name: Signs & Markers
Objective.Description: Continue to support establishing wayfinding signs and historic markers to identify Island historic sites, historic neighborhoods, important people, and important historic events.

Objective.Name: Office of Cultural Affairs
Objective.Description: Continue to support the Office of Cultural Affairs (OCA) in efforts to establish wayfinding signs for unique historic areas.

Objective.Name: Educational Programs
Objective.Description: Continue to foster establishing educational programs that help residents and visitors of all ages to understand the long, unique history and rich cultural traditions on Hilton Head Island.

Objective.Name: Gullah Culture
Objective.Description: Establish a program to educate Town officials, area school teachers, and others on Gullah culture so they can better understand the culture and more effectively interact with the Islands Gullah citizens per the Gullah Geechee Preservation Project Report.

Objective.Name: Preservation
Objective.Description: Continue to support efforts towards the preservation of historic island culture, including that of the Gullah Geechee culture.

Objective.Name: Land Acquisition
Objective.Description: Continue to work with local communities and organizations and investigate land acquisition towards the preservation of historic and cultural sites for future generations to enjoy.

Objective.Name: Arts, Culture & History
Objective.Description: Continue to support arts, culture, and history opportunities that contribute to the unique character of the Island.

Objective.Name: Mitchelville
Objective.Description: Support the development of Historic Mitchelville Freedom Park.

Objective.Name: Coastal Discovery Museum
Objective.Description: Support the planned expansion of the Coastal Discovery Museum.

Goal.Name: COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
Goal.Description: Foster sustainable, inclusive, equitable, and innovative community development on the Island.

Objective.Name: Events, Organizations & Spaces
Objective.Description: Foster events, organizations, and gathering spaces that encourage involvement from the Islands entire population.

Objective.Name: Community Building
Objective.Description: Continue to identify the many different organizations and groups that currently are involved in community building efforts inside and outside the Islands gated communities.

Objective.Name: Workforce Housing
Objective.Description: Implement the recommendations from the Workforce Housing Strategic Plan.
Objective.OtherInformation: See Connected Tactic 4.1.1, Economy Strategy 6.1, Infrastructure Strategy 6.1, Regional Goal 2

Objective.Name: Redevelopment
Objective.Description: Consider creating opportunities for diversity in housing costs and transportation modes by creating incentives for redevelopment of abandoned and underutilized spaces.

Objective.Name: Employer Assisted Housing
Objective.Description: Encourage employer assisted housing programs to encourage more employees of various professions (teachers, police officers, firemen, etc) to live within Town limits.

Objective.Name: Collaboration & Interaction
Objective.Description: Encourage collaboration and interaction between residential communities.

Objective.Name: Housing Issues
Objective.Description: Address housing issues by using a systemic approach that integrates economic development, transportation, and land use.

Objective.Name: Gullah Geechee Project
Objective.Description: Integrate public policy recommendations from the Gullah Geechee Project Report.

Goal.Name: NATURAL & CULTURAL RESOURCES
Goal.Description: Create awareness and respect for our core community and environmental values, ensuring inclusiveness and equality for all residents and guests.

Objective.Name: Natural & Cultural Areas
Objective.Description: Encourage programs and education that include residents and visitors in the culture to maintain Island cleanliness, preservation, and protection of natural and cultural preservation areas.

Objective.Name: Access
Objective.Description: Continue to provide access for Island residents and visitors to enjoy the natural Island environment, so that there is equitable availability via fishing docks, boat ramps, boat launches, ADA infrastructure, parks and open space, trails and pathways, and conserved natural areas for either recreational or personal enjoyment.

Goal.Name: DIVERSITY
Goal.Description: Promote multi-dimensional diversity on the Island, now and into the future.

Objective.Name: Needs & Assets
Objective.Description: Continue to recognize the basic needs and assets for Island communities.

Objective.Name: ADA
Objective.Description: Ensure that local businesses and other public spaces accommodate the ease of mobility for citizens with physical disabilities by complying with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA).

Objective.Name: Interactivity
Objective.Description: Foster innovative ways to bridge residential communities inside and outside of the gates with respect to age, income, culture, and education.

Objective.Name: Needs
Objective.Description: Identify and address the needs of the different demographics on the Island that include, but are not limited to, the elderly, youth, disabled, Native Island, and Hispanic populations.

Goal.Name: CULTURAL TOURISM
Goal.Description: Promote equitable cultural tourism to improve the quality of life for all stakeholders.

Objective.Name: Media
Objective.Description: Continue to support and improve media coverage on the Towns website, social media, and newsletter for local arts and cultural events.

Objective.Name: Art & Cultural Resources
Objective.Description: Continue to recognize the economic value of Hilton Head Islands art and cultural resources in tourism.

Objective.Name: Gullah Geechee Project
Objective.Description: Integrate cultural preservation recommendations from the Gullah Geechee Project Report.

Goal.Name: HEALTHCARE
Goal.Description: Foster healthcare and health education that are available, accessible, affordable, innovative, and benefits all.

Objective.Name: Healthcare
Objective.Description: Coordinate with organizations, such as Volunteers in Medicine, to assess healthcare needs for the diverse Island population.

Objective.Name: Offerings
Objective.Description: Consider encouraging diverse offerings to access healthcare, such as Mobile Units.

Objective.Name: Innovation & Investment
Objective.Description: Foster an environment that will promote innovation and private sector investment in the healthcare industry.

Goal.Name: ARTS, RECREATION & CULTURE
Goal.Description: Build diversity and provide exceptional quality of life offerings in arts and recreation.

Objective.Name: Venues
Objective.Description: Continue to create venues to accommodate special events.

Objective.Name: Arts Campus
Objective.Description: Implement the plan for a community arts campus outlined in the Venue Committee Report.

Objective.Name: Parks
Objective.Description: Continue to support and facilitate the use of community parks for festivals and events.

Objective.Name: Displays
Objective.Description: Continue to provide space for the public display of art in parks and within buildings for artists to display their work and add character to the space where it is located.

Objective.Name: Funding
Objective.Description: Continue to support arts through funding sources, such as ATAX.

Objective.Name: Cultural Affairs
Objective.Description: Continue to support the Office of Cultural Affairs and the promotion of cultural events, such as festivals, art exhibits, and performances for all cultures represented on the Island.

Objective.Name: Parks + Recreation
Objective.Description: Implement recommendations from the Parks + Recreation Master Plan.

Goal.Name: PLANNING
Goal.Description: Ensure the planning process is inclusive, collaborative and on-going, responsive to changing circumstances and stakeholder priorities.

Objective.Name: Tools, Applications & Services
Objective.Description: Apply tools, applications and services to facilitate sharing information supporting community connections and collaborative efforts.

Objective.Name: Technology Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Plan for technology infrastructure to facilitate best-in-class government services.

Objective.Name: Social Media
Objective.Description: Maintain a strong presence on social media and keep up with ever-changing and new social media platforms to reinforce the Core Values for the Town.

Objective.Name: Connectivity, Transparency, Outreach & Involvement
Objective.Description: Evaluate the development and use of technology such as online tools, applications, and services to facilitate connectivity, enhance transparency and increase outreach and public involvement.

Objective.Name: Input
Objective.Description: Solicit input from stakeholders when testing new tools for communication.

Objective.Name: Website
Objective.Description: Maintain a best-in-class website that is informative, modern and easy to navigate.

Objective.Name: Communication
Objective.Description: Continue the use of multiple forms of communication that are non-digital or technology based.
Objective.OtherInformation: Evaluate these methods periodically to ensure they are the best options available for communication to meet the needs of the community.

Objective.Name: Participation
Objective.Description: Ensure optimal opportunities are provided for citizen and stakeholder participation in the planning and policy development process.

Objective.Name: Meetings
Objective.Description: Continue to consider citizen participation when setting meeting times.

Objective.Name: Projects & Programs
Objective.Description: Continue to solicit input and participation from stakeholders in Town projects and programs.

Objective.Name: Experts & Taskforces
Objective.Description: Continue to engage experts and taskforces where needed to participate in the planning process.

Objective.Name: Boards
Objective.Description: Work towards a balanced composition of Town boards that reflects the diversity of the Islands population.

Objective.Name: Cooperative Planning
Objective.Description: Engage in cooperative planning efforts with officials from Jasper County, Lowcountry Council of Governments (LCOG), the Town of Bluffton, Beaufort County and other regional localities/counties.

Objective.Name: Training & Learning
Objective.Description: Identify similar areas in the state/region for cross training or opportunities to learn from other municipalities.

Goal.Name: BUILT ENVIRONMENT
Goal.Description: Promote designs for the built environment that capitalize on our natural beauty and community strengths, reinforcing our unique sense of place.

Objective.Name: Spaces & Streetscape
Neighborhoods
Objective.Description: Foster community connectivity in the location and design of neighborhoods.

Objective.Name: Nodes & Modes
Objective.Description: Foster the creation of community nodes with multiple modes of transport connectivity.

Objective.Name: Spaces & Pathways
Objective.Description: Encourage neighborhood designs that provide gathering spaces and connectivity to the pathway network.

Objective.Name: Interconnections
Objective.Description: Encourage interconnection between developments to promote the establishment of neighborhoods and to provide safe and convenient access to neighborhood level public facilities, such as parks and schools.

Objective.Name: Residential Developments
Objective.Description: Find ways to ensure exceptional quality of life ideals are considered when reviewing proposed residential developments.

Objective.Name: Housing & Transportation
Objective.Description: Consider creating incentives for redevelopment with goals of diversity in housing types and cost and types of transportation modes.

Goal.Name: COLLABORATION
Goal.Description: Enable residents and visitors to collaborate around common values and celebrate the realization of shared objectives.

Objective.Name: Events, Organizations & Communication
Objective.Description: Foster events, organizations, and communication infrastructure that encourage involvement from the Islands entire population.

Objective.Name: Nonprofits
Objective.Description: Share data and planning requests to help nonprofit organizations, through the provision of public information, more effectively meet community needs.

Objective.Name: Community Information
Objective.Description: Encourage creation of a single source for community information, both online and in print, and participate by providing information on Town programs and events.

Objective.Name: Organizations & Groups
Objective.Description: Continue to identify the many different organizations and groups that are involved in community building efforts inside and outside the Islands gated communities.

Objective.Name: Workshops & Education Events
Objective.Description: Evaluate the creation of workshops and education series on various topics.
Objective.OtherInformation: Consider partnering with universities or other communities.

Objective.Name: Communication Plan
Objective.Description: Continue to maintain and evaluate the Towns communication plan to meet the needs of the community.

Goal.Name: QUALITY OF LIFE
Goal.Description: Foster an exceptional quality of life for residents, outstanding experiences for visitors, and economic opportunity for our workforce.

Objective.Name: Diversity
Objective.Description: Foster a healthy, self-sustaining community that encourages economic, cultural, and demographic diversity by understanding the needs and assets of each of the Islands many different communities.

Objective.Name: Workforce Housing
Objective.Description: Continue to implement the recommendations from the Workforce Housing Strategic Plan.
Objective.OtherInformation: See Economy Strategy 6.1, Inclusive Strategy 3.3, Infrastructure Strategy 6.1, Regional Goal 2

Objective.Name: Gullah Geechee Project
Objective.Description: Continue to implement the recommendations from the Gullah Geechee Land and Cultural Preservation Taskforce, and the Gullah Geechee Preservation Project Report.

Stakeholder.Name: Gullah Geechee Land and Cultural Preservation Taskforce

Objective.Name: Sites & Buildings
Objective.Description: In support of aging in place efforts, encourage site and building designs that provide high quality experiences associated with ADA requirements, rather than just meeting the minimum standards.
Objective.OtherInformation: Consider a policy that requires the retrofitting of nonconforming sites. See Excellence Strategy 2.4, Inclusive Strategy 5.2

Objective.Name: Scholastic Environment
Objective.Description: Maintain effective and open relationships with education institutions and organizations to ensure there is a vibrant scholastic environment on the Island.

Objective.Name: Place & QOL
Objective.Description: Reinforce Hilton Head Islands unique sense of place and quality of life though environmental education, protection and access to nature and wildlife.

Objective.Name: Promotion & Celebration
Objective.Description: Celebrate and promote the Islands rich arts, culture, history, environment, and recreation opportunities.

Goal.Name: PLANNING
Goal.Description: Enable innovation and excellence in regional planning and coordination for the Town of Hilton Head Island as a built-in part of the everyday process.

Objective.Name: Collaboration
Objective.Description: Collaborate with nearby jurisdictions on regional efforts to increase communication and participation between Hilton Head Island and regional municipal, county, and state governments.

Objective.Name: Legislative Issues
Objective.Description: Increase advocacy efforts related to legislative issues that affect the region.

Objective.Name: Workshops & Retreats
Objective.Description: Encourage attendance at annual workshops and/or retreats of other government agencies.

Objective.Name: Partnerships
Objective.Description: Participate and share in the leadership of the development of strong partnerships within Beaufort County and the region.

Objective.Name: Emergencies
Objective.Description: Coordinate with regional partners on emergency planning, response, evacuation, and communication.

Objective.Name: SOLOCO
Objective.Description: Continue to participate in meetings and serve as a member on the Southern Lowcountry Regional Board (SOLOCO).

Objective.Name: Economic Development
Objective.Description: Build and strengthen existing relationships with regional and private sector economic development partners.

Objective.Name: Industry & Research
Objective.Description: Begin building links to innovative research institutions and industry groups in the Savannah Region.

Objective.Name: Private Sector
Objective.Description: Develop programs and policies to encourage the private sector to become involved in addressing issues such as housing, climate change, environmental protection, and education.

Goal.Name: WORKFORCE HOUSING
Goal.Description: Increase supply of workforce housing on Hilton Head Island and in the region within an acceptable commute.
Goal.OtherInformation: See Connected Tactic 4.1.1, Economy Strategy 6.1, Inclusive Strategy 3.3, Infrastructure Strategy 6.1

Objective.Name: Cooperation
Objective.Description: Pursue regional cooperation of public, private and nonprofit agencies in meeting area housing needs.

Objective.Name: Solutions
Objective.Description: Work toward regional solutions to workforce housing issues that result in the construction of quality workforce housing.

Objective.Name: Employer Assistance
Objective.Description: Encourage employer assisted housing programs to allow more employees of various professions (teachers, police officers, firemen, etc.) to live within the Town limits or within Beaufort County.

Objective.Name: Trust Fund
Objective.Description: Evaluate and consider participation in a Regional Housing Trust Fund.

Goal.Name: TRANSPORTATION
Goal.Description: Increase access between Hilton Head Island and the region through a viable multimodal transportation system.

Objective.Name: Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Improve/expand transportation infrastructure to connect the Islands multimodal system to the rest of the region.

Objective.Name: Safety
Objective.Description: Coordinate with the State and County to seek funding for safety improvements to provide for a safe, efficient and well-maintained regional transportation network and to protect the capital investment in the transportation system through adequate maintenance of facilities and roadways.

Objective.Name: Pathways
Objective.Description: Coordinate with Beaufort County to enhance the Islands pathway network by providing a link from the Towns multi-use pathways to pathway systems on the mainland.

Objective.Name: Traffic
Objective.Description: Coordinate traffic modeling with regional partners for use in future critical, regional transportation projects to develop a regional transportation vision that identifies emerging needs.

Objective.Name: Public Transit
Objective.Description: Complement public transit operations such as those of Palmetto Breeze (LRTA), by connecting transit stops with employment and tourist destinations.

Objective.Name: Marine-Based Transportation
Objective.Description: Encourage coordination of regional partners to assess potential marine-based transportation to serve Hilton Head Island, Beaufort and Savannah when feasible.

Objective.Name: Evacuation Routes
Objective.Description: Coordinate and work with appropriate agencies to plan for, evaluate, and implement evacuation routes away from the coast of South Carolina and Georgia for safety, efficiency, and capacity.

Objective.Name: Roadways
Objective.Description: Work with appropriate agencies, including SCDOT, Town of Bluffton and Beaufort County, to provide input on roadway improvements along the US 278 corridor and projects such as the widening of I-95 and I-16, as well as the secondary road system in southern Beaufort County.

Objective.Name: Transportation & Land Use
Objective.Description: Promote regional transportation and land use planning for all of southern Beaufort County by working with the Town of Bluffton, Hardeeville, and Beaufort County.

Objective.Name: Public Transit
Objective.Description: Encourage the coordination of regional public transit to serve the mainland and the Island for workers and visitors, including the potential for public transit to and from the Savannah-Hilton Head International Airport and the Hilton Head Island Airport.

Objective.Name: Bridges & Causeways
Objective.Description: Coordinate with appropriate agencies for the protection and routine maintenance of the bridges and causeways that provide the only ground transportation link from the Island to the mainland.

Goal.Name: ENVIRONMENT
Goal.Description: Lead the region in environmental protection and eco-friendly practices.

Objective.Name: Resiliency
Objective.Description: Develop regional approaches to promote resiliency to climate change and sea level rise.

Objective.Name: Environmental Education
Objective.Description: Partner regionally on environmental education by initiating and maintaining partnerships with other municipalities, county, state, and federal agencies for environmental education purposes.

Objective.Name: Workshops & Seminars
Objective.Description: Host workshops and seminars in Beaufort County for the general publics information on environmental issues and regulations.

Objective.Name: Land Acquisition
Objective.Description: Partner on land acquisition to preserve open space or serve the needs of the region for parks and recreation.

Objective.Name: Undeveloped Property
Objective.Description: Coordinate with various agencies including Beaufort County Rural & Critical Lands Board and property owners to identify and purchase undeveloped property for parks and recreation or preservation as needed.

Stakeholder.Name: Beaufort County Rural & Critical Lands Board

Objective.Name: Conservation & Recreation
Objective.Description: Coordinate conservation of regional environmental assets and plans for natural resource and habitat preservation by acquiring conservation and park land to preserve natural and cultural resources for education, interpretive, and passive recreation uses.

Objective.Name: Recycling & Waste Management
Objective.Description: Cooperate with Beaufort County and appropriate agencies to seek funding sources to increase the capacity and level of service for recycling and waste management on the Island.

Objective.Name: Development & Redevelopment
Objective.Description: Promote environmental protection through regulation and eco-friendly practices during the development and redevelopment processes in the region.

Goal.Name: TOURISM
Goal.Description: Expand tourism focus in order to promote diverse offerings across the region.

Objective.Name: Marketing
Objective.Description: Partner across the region to identify and market our collective strengths, unique qualities, and cultural/heritage tourism in order to identify, develop and leverage the regions competitive advantages.

Objective.Name: Businesses
Objective.Description: Attract businesses that can appropriately diversify the regions tourism industry, such as technology and sustainability.

Objective.Name: Regional Assets
Objective.Description: Identify and encourage the conservation of regional assets that bring people to the area/region.

Goal.Name: TRANSPORTATION (LAND)
Goal.Description: Establish a dedicated, Island-specific transportation system.

Objective.Name: Roads
Objective.Description: Maintain and improve the road network to provide safe and convenient access and interconnections to all areas of the Island.

Objective.Name: Transportation Plan
Objective.Description: Develop and implement a transportation plan for Hilton Head Island including specific action items to address resident, worker and visitor transportation, transit, multi-modal and multi-use pathway related goals and strategies in the comprehensive plan.

Objective.Name: Capacity
Objective.Description: Coordinate with SCDOT and Beaufort County to maintain the Islands capacity needs of William Hilton Parkway and other arterial streets.

Objective.Name: Alternative Roads
Objective.Description: Continue to consider plans for alternative road systems to remove some of the traffic burden from William Hilton Parkway.

Objective.Name: Neighborhoods
Objective.Description: Future road projects within the Town should be carefully planned to minimize impact to neighborhoods.

Objective.Name: Land Acquisition
Objective.Description: Consider acquisition of land for future transportation improvements.

Objective.Name: Traffic Analysis
Objective.Description: Maintain specific traffic analysis standards in the Land Management Ordinance to guide development in accordance with the existing and future needs of the Town.

Objective.Name: Automobile Alternatives
Objective.Description: Promote the installation of infrastructure that supports emerging alternatives to traditional automobile travel.

Objective.Name: AVs, Micro Transit & MaaS
Objective.Description: Ensure policies effectively regulate and infrastructure reasonably accommodates emerging modesof transportation, such as Autonomous Vehicles (AVs), micro transit, and Mobility as a Service (MaaS).
Objective.OtherInformation: MaaS Definition: MaaS is a concept describing a shift away from the ownership of personal vehicles for transportation to the use of public and private services offered through a unified structure to meet the specified needs of travelers.

Objective.Name: Complete Streets
Objective.Description: Continue to implement concepts, such as Complete Streets, where appropriate that integrate multiple forms of transportation modes and promote connectivity.

Objective.Name: Streetscapes
Objective.Description: Evaluate and install streetscape methods to establish Island character for redevelopment areas, roadways, recreation or activity centers, pedestrian oriented areas, and gateways.
Objective.OtherInformation: These methods should include safety standards for drivers, pedestrians and cyclists, as well as use of coordinated landscaping, lighting, street furniture, and other public amenities. See Connected Strategy 2.1

Objective.Name: Roads
Objective.Description: Maintain all roads on Hilton Head Island to ensure safety and improve access for all users.

Objective.Name: Dirt Roads
Objective.Description: Continue to encourage and facilitate the paving of dirt roads throughout the Island.

Objective.Name: Maintenance
Objective.Description: Continue to work with and encourage Beaufort County, SCDOT, and private road owners to protect investment in the transportation system through adequate maintenance of facilities, roadways and associated drainage facilities.

Objective.Name: Maintenance & Litter
Objective.Description: Continue to offer maintenance services and support litter-control efforts on and off Island.

Objective.Name: Funding
Objective.Description: Ensure the Town receives sufficient and equitable funding for transportation projects.

Objective.Name: Safety Improvements
Objective.Description: Continue to seek funding for safety improvements to Island roads by coordinating with SCDOT, the Beaufort County Transportation Committee (CTC), and other entities to secure funds.

Objective.Name: Impact Fees
Objective.Description: Consider updating the transportation impact fees program for both the Town and the County with new developments paying for capacity enhancing modifications based on their impact to the transportation system.

Objective.Name: Traffic Volume
Objective.Description: Continue to collect and maintain data on traffic volume for the road network throughout the year to assess existing and potential deficiencies in the road network and to provide a basis for making future transportation and land use decisions.

Objective.Name: Traffic Reports
Objective.Description: Continue to prepare Traffic Monitoring and Evaluation Reports on an annual basis.

Objective.Name: Traffic Modeling
Objective.Description: Perform traffic modeling through the regional traffic model at least once every 10 years, or more often as needs and concerns dictate, to identify locations for roadway improvements and define capital improvement projects.

Objective.Name: Traffic Circles
Objective.Description: Consider preparing Traffic Monitoring and Evaluation Reports on an annual basis for the Islands traffic circles.

Objective.Name: Safety Education
Objective.Description: Continue to educate and involve the public regarding transportation safety issues.

Objective.Name: Technology & Best Practices
Objective.Description: Research best practices from other communities to ensure education and communication efforts are using emerging forms of technology and new trends in communication.

Objective.Name: Laws & Regulations
Objective.Description: Coordinate with State and local law enforcement officials to enforce transportation related laws and other regulations that improve safety.

Objective.Name: Evacuation Routes
Objective.Description: Coordinate with appropriate agencies to plan for and implement safe and efficient evacuation routes off of the Island.

Objective.Name: Public Transportation
Objective.Description: Expand the public transportation system serving the Island in a fiscally responsible manner to provide transportation options to the greatest number of residents, workers, and visitors.
Objective.OtherInformation: See Economy Strategy 1.2, Regional Strategy 3.1, Environment Strategies 7.1 and 7.2

Objective.Name: Service Alternatives
Objective.Description: Research alternative ways to provide needed services, such as programs that subsidize ride share services for specific destinations, and explore ways to support last-mile transportation options.

Objective.Name: Transit Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Promote public transportation by evaluating the incorporation of transit infrastructure for suitable developments.

Objective.Name: Park-n-Ride & Buses
Objective.Description: Explore opportunities for Park-n-Ride lots for commuters and/or public or private bus services for commuters.

Objective.Name: Coordination
Objective.Description: Support coordination between public transportation providers, major employers, large communities and special needs providers to increase the utility of public transportation and connect public and private transit systems.

Objective.Name: AVs
Objective.Description: Plan for the needs of AVs used for public transportation.

Objective.Name: Pathways
Objective.Description: Expand the multi-use pathway network to provide a comprehensive, Island-wide network that provides for recreational opportunities as well as an alternative means of transportation to/from and on the Island.

Objective.Name: Road & Drainage Projects
Objective.Description: Continue to assess the viability of constructing multi-use pathways and supporting infrastructure in conjunction with each Town road improvement or drainage project.

Objective.Name: Greenway
Objective.Description: Investigate creating a signature, multi-use greenway connecting commercial, civic, historic, recreation and cultural sites.

Objective.Name: Public Transit
Objective.Description: Ensure the multi-use pathway network complements public transit services such as Palmetto Breeze by connecting transit stops with employment, commercial, and recreational destinations.

Objective.Name: Developments & Sidewalks
Objective.Description: Examine requiring connections between developments and nearby sidewalks and multi-use pathways to improve safety and accessibility.

Objective.Name: Mainland Connection
Objective.Description: Coordinate with SCDOT and Beaufort County to establish a safe multi- use pathway connection between the Island and the mainland.

Objective.Name: Funding
Objective.Description: Continue to seek funding for safety improvements to Island multi-use pathways by coordinating with SCDOT, the Beaufort County Transportation Committee (CTC), and other entities.

Objective.Name: Pathways
Objective.Description: Continue to improve safety of the multi-use pathway system by identifying conflicts and improvement opportunities.

Objective.Name: Inventory & Maintenance
Objective.Description: Inventory and maintain areas for safety issues, such as low-hanging vegetation, inadequate signage, lines of sight, and irregular asphalt.

Objective.Name: Accidents
Objective.Description: Use accident data to determine and plan pedestrian and bicyclist needs at intersections, including crossings and warning alerts.

Objective.Name: Programs
Objective.Description: Investigate opportunities to implement safety programs such as Safe Routes to Schools for the benefit of the community.

Goal.Name: TRANSPORTATION (AIR)
Goal.Description: Right-Size the airports capabilities and operations.

Objective.Name: Accessibility
Objective.Description: Continue to collaborate with federal, state, and county authorities and general aviation interests to enhance visitor, business and resident accessibility to aviation services.

Objective.Name: Impacts
Objective.Description: Ensure that development surrounding the airport is designed and constructed to minimize the negative impacts of being located near the airport.

Objective.Name: Safety
Objective.Description: Continue to review development proposals within the Airport Overlay (A-O) District to ensure the site is designed with the maximum safety possible for the occupants of the site.

Objective.Name: Residential & Property Impacts
Objective.Description: Encourage Beaufort County to evaluate the interests of nearby residents and property owners when considering changes to the airport facilities.

Objective.Name: Modifications
Objective.Description: Assist Beaufort County with pre-planning for airport modifications.

Objective.Name: Master Plan
Objective.Description: Participate in updates to the Hilton Head Island Airport Master Plan.

Objective.Name: Disaster Staging
Objective.Description: Coordinate with Beaufort County for potential use of the airport as a staging ground during disaster recovery.

Goal.Name: RESILIENCE
Goal.Description: Plan for physical, social, and economic resilience from climate and environmental challenges.

Objective.Name: Sea Levels & Storms
Objective.Description: Establish an integrated program for resistance to and resilience from the effects of rising sea levels and tropical storms.

Objective.Name: Public Development Projects
Objective.Description: The Town should consider assessing environmental resistance and resilience when considering private and public development projects.

Objective.Name: Zoning & Building Codes
Objective.Description: Evaluate changes to zoning and building codes to minimize vulnerabilities.

Objective.Name: Disaster Relief Funds
Objective.Description: Continue to maintain and replenish Town disaster relief funds.

Objective.Name: Sea-Level Rise
Objective.Description: Consider developing and implementing a sea-level rise adaptation plan for the Town.

Objective.Name: Investments
Objective.Description: Identify and fund proactive investments in public actions which enhance resistance to and recovery from environmental challenges.

Goal.Name: UTILITIES
Goal.Description: Foster safe, effective and resilient utility systems for the Island.

Objective.Name: Policies & Investments
Objective.Description: Promote utility infrastructure policies and investments that promote efficiency, improve safety and environmental quality, and embrace emerging technologies.

Objective.Name: Water Resources
Objective.Description: Encourage collaborative projects and programs among the Public Service Districts that benefit long-term water resource stewardship and protection.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Consider the challenges and impact storms and sea-level rise have on the Islands stormwater infrastructure.

Objective.Name: Water Use
Objective.Description: Enforce community standards for discretionary water use.

Objective.Name: Irrigation
Objective.Description: Support programs and education to help reduce the use of potable water for residential irrigation.

Objective.Name: Code
Objective.Description: Explore methods to increase compliance with the existing residential irrigation code.

Objective.Name: Reclamation
Objective.Description: Use reclaimed water when maintaining Town projects where financially feasible.

Objective.Name: Education
Objective.Description: Develop a program to educate the public on water conservation and water reuse.

Objective.Name: Alternatives
Objective.Description: Investigate development and operation of alternative energy and water sources.

Objective.Name: Potable Water
Objective.Description: Encourage PSD investigations into alternative sources of potable water.

Objective.Name: Sewer
Objective.Description: Encourage sewer service connections made possible through partnership with the Hilton Head PSD.

Objective.Name: Fire Hydrants
Objective.Description: Continue to work with the three Public Service Districts to develop programs that ensure fire hydrants are installed in needed locations to minimize the risk of fire hazards.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Funding
Objective.Description: Ensure the Towns Stormwater Utility is adequately funded, supported and staffed to meet existing and anticipated needs of the Islands stormwater policies, programs and infrastructure.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Continue to ensure stormwater infrastructure is well-maintained, resilient and effective.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Plan
Objective.Description: Continue to work with Beaufort County in coordination of updating and implementing the Beaufort County Stormwater Master Plan as applicable.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Utility
Objective.Description: Evaluate the need for the Towns Stormwater Utility to develop, adopt and implement a Town of Hilton Head Island Stormwater Master Plan and Policy Guide to be reviewed and updated every five years.
Objective.OtherInformation: This could address any outdated aspects of the 1995 Island Wide Drainage Study.

Objective.Name: Drainage
Objective.Description: Consider updating the 1995 Island Wide Drainage Study to address current conditions and needs, or incorporate into a new plan per Strategy 4.6.3 above.

Objective.Name: Stormwater Management
Objective.Description: Ensure that the NPDES Stormwater Management Plan is annually updated and implemented for compliance with the 1972 Clean Water Act and the Towns state NPDES permit.

Goal.Name: PUBLIC SERVICES
Goal.Description: Promote efficient and secure public services to meet current and future needs.
Goal.OtherInformation: Public Services Definition: Public services include safety, emergency, planning, and administrative services provided by the Town for the public.

Objective.Name: Town Government
Objective.Description: Ensure the Town government and staff are structured to meet the challenges of increased population, regulatory complexity, technical development, and public expectations.

Objective.Name: Staffing
Objective.Description: Evaluate and address staffing levels of existing and potential new departments as needed, and consider the facility needs of the Town staff for the next twenty years.

Objective.Name: Town Facilities
Objective.Description: Evaluate existing Town facilities and identify opportunities for redevelopment or new construction to provide best in class facilities across the Town government.

Objective.Name: Fire Rescue Facilities
Objective.Description: Identify the redevelopment of Town and Fire Rescue facilities in a manner that provides for resiliency during disaster situations, to include the Emergency Operations Center, E911 Communications Center, Fire Rescue Headquarters/Fleet Maintenance, and other facilities.

Objective.Name: Services & Facilities
Objective.Description: Ensure the Town continues to provide best-in-class services and facilities that meet or exceed the expectations of its residents and visitors.

Objective.Name: Funding
Objective.Description: Continue to research the availability of new funding sources that will help to diversify the Towns revenue sources and assist in funding any new services that may be provided by the Town.

Objective.Name: Public Services
Objective.Description: Ensure the safety of Town residents and visitors through excellent law enforcement, Fire Rescue, Emergency Management and Disaster Recovery Services.

Objective.Name: Assessment & Adjustment
Objective.Description: Continue to assess all public services regularly and adjust services as necessary.

Objective.Name: Accreditation & Improvement
Objective.Description: Support and utilize recognized accreditation processes to assure the public of the quality and integrity of Town services and that demonstrates a commitment to continuous improvement.

Objective.Name: Fire Rescue Plan
Objective.Description: Implement the recommendations of the Fire Rescue Strategic Plan.

Objective.Name: Emergencies
Objective.Description: Support the evaluation of the Fire Rescue Standard of Cover Document to ensure the emergencies experienced by the public are addressed with a timely response model that provides adequate resources and staffing.

Objective.Name: Land Acquisition
Objective.Description: Continue to implement the Towns Land Acquisition Program.

Objective.Name: Island Character
Objective.Description: Continue to preserve and protect the Islands character through land acquisition.

Objective.Name: Town-Owned Land
Objective.Description: Evaluate the use of Town-owned land for construction of public facilities and/or the establishment of active and passive parks.

Objective.Name: Land Acquisition
Objective.Description: Evaluate the funding and policies of the Land Acquisition Program to determine if any changes are required to better address the needs of the community.

Objective.Name: Essential Services
Objective.Description: Encourage public service providers to ensure continuity of essential services for all Island residents and businesses.

Objective.Name: Hazard Mitigation
Objective.Description: Continue the Mitigation Actions in the Beaufort County Hazard Mitigation Plan and participate in future updates.

Objective.Name: Disaster Recovery
Objective.Description: Continue the implementation of the Disaster Recovery Plan.

Objective.Name: Emergency Operations
Objective.Description: Continue the review and implementation of the Towns Emergency Operations Plan to prepare for a response to events impacting the Island community.

Objective.Name: CIP
Objective.Description: Continue the development and implementation of the Towns Ten-year Capital Improvements Program (CIP).

Objective.Name: Coordination
Objective.Description: Coordinate the CIP with any and all agencies that provide public facilities to the Town, including PSDs, Beaufort County, etc.

Objective.Name: Funding
Objective.Description: Prepare and update a 10-year CIP on an annual basis that includes funding options.

Objective.Name: Public Facilities
Objective.Description: Evaluate public facility demands for new or redevelopment on a project-by-project basis to assure capital facilities are provided concurrent with development.

Objective.Name: Transportation Investments
Objective.Description: Plan and coordinate future transportation investments.

Objective.Name: State Laws
Objective.Description: Continue to update and maintain a ten-year CIP in accordance with all state laws.
Objective.OtherInformation: This program should consider road and multi-use pathway improvements, park and town facilities, and drainage projects, at a minimum.

Objective.Name: Drainage
Objective.Description: Coordinate improvements to the Towns 1995 Island Wide Drainage Study and other Capital Improvement Projects in conjunction with transportation improvements.

Objective.Name: Transportation Coordination
Objective.Description: Coordinate transportation improvements with the Towns 1995 Island Wide Drainage Study and any other drainage, water or sewer improvement project.

Goal.Name: HOUSING
Goal.Description: Promote housing options to meet the needs of all current and future populations on the Island.

Objective.Name: Workforce Housing
Objective.Description: Adopt policies to support the recommendations per the Workforce Housing Strategic Plan.
Objective.OtherInformation: See Connected Tactic 4.1.1, Economy Strategy 6.1, Inclusive Strategy 3.3, Regional Goal 2

Objective.Name: Codes & Standards
Objective.Description: Continually assess development standards and building codes to ensure they encourage the development of needed housing.

Objective.Name: Interconnections
Objective.Description: Consider regulations to require interconnection between developments, which promotes the establishment of neighborhoods and to provide safe and convenient access to neighborhood level public facilities, particularly schools and parks.

Objective.Name: Residential Density
Objective.Description: Evaluate proposed changes to residential density to ensure they are appropriate for the character of the area and the neighboring properties.

Goal.Name: TECHNOLOGY
Goal.Description: Anticipate policy implications and resource investments needed to embrace emerging technologies.

Objective.Name: Emerging Technologies
Objective.Description: Adopt policies to accommodate emerging technologies while continuing to adapt for future needs or trends, for example, fiber optic service for the entire Island, 5G, information management, and cellularsatellite.

Objective.Name: Continuous Improvement
Objective.Description: Continue to implement technology improvements and provide quality information technology at Town facilities.

Objective.Name: Action Plan
Objective.Description: Update the Hilton Head Island Technology Action Plan regularly to ensure it addresses changes in existing and emerging technology.
